Package uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid.base

Class Summary
DroidConstants Controls the file format identification analysis On startup, it launches either the command line or the GUI package.
FileFormatHit holds the description of a hit (format identification) on a file
MessageDisplay Allows messages to be displayed in the most appropriate manner to the user.
SimpleElement holds the basic details of an element read from an XML file
